com.tiyb.tev.controller

Class TEVPostRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.controller.TEVPostRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class TEVPostRestController
extends java.lang.Object

    This is the REST controller for working with Post data, including special kinds of posts such as "regular" and "photo" posts.

    Author:
    tiyb

      • createPost

        @PostMapping(value="/posts")
public Post createPost(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                    @Valid Post post)
        POST request to submit a Tumblr post into the system
        Parameters:
        post - The Post object (in JSON format) to be saved into the database
        Returns:
        The same Post object that was saved (including the ID)

      • createHashtag

        @PostMapping(value="/hashtags")
public Hashtag createHashtag(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                             @Valid java.lang.String hashtag)
        POST request to insert a new hashtag into the system. If it already exists the existing hashtag is simply returned (no error is thrown).
        Parameters:
        hashtag - The hashtag to be entered into the system
        Returns:
        The new/existing hashtag object (with ID)

        Returns:

      • getPostsByType

        @GetMapping(value="/posts/type/{type}")
public java.util.List<Post> getPostsByType(@PathVariable(value="type")
                                                                                   java.lang.String postType)
        Returns all posts of a particular type
        Parameters:
        postType - One of the 5 post types supported by Tumblr/TEV
        Returns:
        List of posts of that type

      • isValidType

        private boolean isValidType(java.lang.String typeName,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> validTypeNames)
        Helper function to determine if a type (based on String) is one of the valid Tumblr post types
        Parameters:
        typeName - String containing the type
        validTypeNames - List of all valid type names (would be retrieved from the Metadata REST controller)
        Returns:
        True if it's one of the 5 valid types; false otherwise

      • fixPhotosForPost

        @GetMapping(value="/posts/{id}/fixPhotos")
public java.lang.Boolean fixPhotosForPost(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                     java.lang.Long postId)
        The Tumblr export doesn't always include every image, for some reason. However, in many cases the images referred to in the image URLs from Tumblr's export XML still exist on Tumblr's servers. So, in cases where a post is missing its images, this API can be used to fetch the images from Tumblr's servers (according to their URLs in the XML), download them, and save them to the media directory being used by TEV, using the naming convention Tumblr would have used, if the images had been included in the export.
        Parameters:
        postId - The ID of the post to be "fixed"
        Returns:
        bool indicating whether the action completed successfully or not.

      • createRegular

        @PostMapping(value="/posts/{id}/regular")
public Regular createRegular(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                       java.lang.Long postId,
                                                                       @Valid @RequestBody
                                                                       @Valid Regular regular)
        POST request to submit a "regular" post into the system. (The naming is awkward, but "regular" is one type of Tumblr post.)
        Parameters:
        postId - The ID of the post to which this "regular" post content refers
        regular - The data to be submitted
        Returns:
        The same Regular object that was submitted.
